Package it.polimi.ingsw.gameZone

Class MarbleMarket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gameZone.MarbleMarket
public class MarbleMarket
extends java.lang.Object
MarbleMarket represents the resources market

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MarbleMarket()
    The constructor initializes rows and columns to 3 and 4 respectively 13 Marbles are created and randomly placed in marbles and in freeMarble

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    MarbleColour getFreeMarbleColour()
    getFreeMarbleColour returns the MarbleColour of the free marble
    MarbleColour getMarketColour​(int row, int column)
    getMarketColour returns the MarbleColour of a given Marble in the market
    void pushColumn​(int column)
    pushColumn applies the operation of pushing the free marble into a given column
    void pushRow​(int row)
    pushRow applies the operation of pushing the free marble into a given row
    ObtainableResourceSet selectColumn​(int column, Board board)
    selectColumn returns the ObtainableResourceSet obtained by selecting a given column of the market
    ObtainableResourceSet selectRow​(int row, Board board)
    selectRow returns the ObtainableResourceSet obtained by selecting a given row of the market

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MarbleMarket

      public MarbleMarket()
      The constructor initializes rows and columns to 3 and 4 respectively 13 Marbles are created and randomly placed in marbles and in freeMarble

  • Method Details

    • selectRow

      public ObtainableResourceSet selectRow​(int row, Board board) throws InvalidMarbleMarketIndexException, InvalidBoardException
      selectRow returns the ObtainableResourceSet obtained by selecting a given row of the market
      Parameters:
      row - The chosen row
      board - The Board of the player selecting this row (this is used for applying ConversionEffects)
      Returns:
      An ObtainableResourceSet representing all resources collected by selecting the given row
      Throws:
      InvalidMarbleMarketIndexException - row is outside the range of marbles
      InvalidBoardException - board is null

    • selectColumn

      public ObtainableResourceSet selectColumn​(int column, Board board) throws InvalidMarbleMarketIndexException, InvalidBoardException
      selectColumn returns the ObtainableResourceSet obtained by selecting a given column of the market
      Parameters:
      column - The chosen column
      board - The Board of the player selecting this row (this is used for applying ConversionEffects)
      Returns:
      An ObtainableResourceSet representing all resources collected by selecting the given column
      Throws:
      InvalidMarbleMarketIndexException - column is outside the range of marbles
      InvalidBoardException - board is null

    • getMarketColour

      public MarbleColour getMarketColour​(int row, int column) throws InvalidMarbleMarketIndexException
      getMarketColour returns the MarbleColour of a given Marble in the market
      Parameters:
      row - The chosen row
      column - The chosen column
      Returns:
      The MarbleColour of the Marble in position row, column in marbles
      Throws:
      InvalidMarbleMarketIndexException - row or column is outside the range of marbles

    • getFreeMarbleColour

      public MarbleColour getFreeMarbleColour()
      getFreeMarbleColour returns the MarbleColour of the free marble
      Returns:
      The MarbleColour of freeMarble

    • pushRow

      public void pushRow​(int row) throws InvalidMarbleMarketIndexException
      pushRow applies the operation of pushing the free marble into a given row
      Parameters:
      row - The chosen row
      Throws:
      InvalidMarbleMarketIndexException - row is outside the range of marbles

    • pushColumn

      public void pushColumn​(int column) throws InvalidMarbleMarketIndexException
      pushColumn applies the operation of pushing the free marble into a given column
      Parameters:
      column - The chosen column
      Throws:
      InvalidMarbleMarketIndexException - column is outside the range of marbles
